metadata.name: Aperture
metadata.description: Opens several shortcuts and all teleporters but hides the end of the game behind a Portal Spell
metadata.author: eldri7ch, Mottzilla, Wecoc

itemLocations.comment: Place Library Card instead of Cat-eye Circl. in the Catacombs for folks who become trapped

writes.comment: Jump to injected code
ori v0, 0x0003
Write to 8003 RAM addresses,
lui v1, 0x8004
Open Entrance to Catacombs
sb v0, 0xBEB3 (v1)
ori v0, 0x0001
Open Shortcut: Caverns - Entrance
sb v0, 0xBE1C (v1)
Open Shortcut: Marble Gallery - Entrance
sb v0, 0xBE1D (v1)
Open Shortcut: Teleporter - Entrance
sb v0, 0xBE1E (v1)
Open Shortcut: Alchemy Lab Cannon
sb v0, 0xBE6F (v1)
Open Shortcut: Olrox's Quarters - Royal Chapel
sb v0, 0xBE4C (v1)
Open Shortcut: Colosseum - Royal Chapel
sb v0, 0xBE9D (v1)
Open Keep Attic Stairs
sb v0, 0xBE80 (v1)
Turn on Outer Wall Elevator
sb v0, 0xBDFC (v1)
Mines Ledge Has Fallen
sb v0, 0xBE3E (v1)
ori v0, 0x001F
Unlock Normal Teleport Rooms
sb v0, 0xBEBC (v1)
Unlock Reverse Teleport Rooms
sb v0, 0xBEBD (v1)
Save Return Address for rA (Map Code)
Call Map Acquisition Function (Map Code)
Arg0 w/ 0
Recall Return Address for rA (Map Code)
nop
Return from injected code
